meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>despise</kanji> this one guy so much that you want to <kanji>humiliate</kanji> him so you <vocabulary>insult</vocabulary> him in public. That wasn't very nice, but it did seem to embarrass him. I guess you won.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
